hero.title: FVNIX

hero.description: We bring natural fragrances and botanical essences from the mysterious highland "Shangri-La" to the Japanese market with pure quality.

values.title: Pure & Natural from Yunnan

altitude.title: High Altitude Excellence

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: ISO 9001, HACCP, cGMP certified. High-quality agricultural products with complete traceability and international standards.

sustainability.title: Sustainable Sourcing
sustainability.description: "Company + Farm + Farmers" model ensures ecological protection and rural revitalization through traceable supply chains.
